verification.password: application password here, google account is easy to setup, just look up application password because you can't use account password here, it will lead to 2FA Error.

SuperSecret.SuperSecretKey: Any Keywords will work here, it's just a key for cookies and stuff like that.

Database_Stuff.host: This is for MySQL, use -localhost- here as it's the default value.
Database_Stuff.user: -root- is the default value but if you have your own user then great.
Database_Stuff.port: 3306 is the default port if yours is preconfigured set it to that.
